allow_modify_statement.description: Allow modifying SQL statements after issue is created.

allow_self_approval.description: Whether to allow issue creators to self-approve their own issues.

auto_enable_backup.description: Whether to automatically enable backup for database changes.

auto_resolve_issue.description: Enable automatic issue resolution when tasks complete.

ci_sampling_size.description:
The maximum number of database rows to sample during CI data validation.
 Without specification, sampling is disabled, resulting in full validation.

data_classification_config_id.description: The data classification configuration ID for the project.

enforce_issue_title.description: Enforce issue title to be created by user instead of generated by Bytebase.

enforce_sql_review.description:
Whether to enforce SQL review checks to pass before issue creation.
 If enabled, issues cannot be created when SQL review finds errors.

execution_retry_policy.description: Execution retry policy for task runs.

force_issue_labels.description: Force issue labels to be used when creating an issue.

issue_labels.description: Labels available for tagging issues in this project.

labels.description:
Labels are key-value pairs that can be attached to the project.
 For example, { "environment": "production", "team": "backend" }

name.description:
The name of the project.
 Format: projects/{project}

parallel_tasks_per_rollout.description: The maximum number of parallel tasks allowed during rollout execution.

postgres_database_tenant_mode.description:
Whether to enable database tenant mode for PostgreSQL.
 If enabled, issues will include "set role <db_owner>" statement.

skip_backup_errors.description: Whether to skip backup errors and continue with data migration.

state.description: The lifecycle state of the project.
state.title: State

title.description: The title or name of a project. It's not unique within the workspace.

webhooks.description: The list of webhooks configured for the project.
